item.title: As Above, So Below (2014)
item.description: Just because I watched The Descent yesterday and it reminded me of this movie, I had to watch it again. I could remember almost nothing about this and was quite surprised at the Tomb Raider-esque treasure hunting setup. The Descent’s setup feels a bit more natural, as does most of that movie. As Above, So Below is a found footage type movie, which I also completely forgot. It is more a gimmick than strictly necessary for any scares or suspense.

item.title: The Descent (2005)
item.description: This is a de(s)cent movie! üòÅ I always get this mixed up with As Above, So Below, mostly because I know that both movies take place in caves. Whereas I had seen As Above, So Below before, The Descent was a new experience for me. The film tells the story of an all female group of friends that go caving together. During the trip they find out that they are not as close knit friends as they thought they were.
